item.title: (Neo)vim
item.description: Experience I wanted to make a custom cheatsheet with all my custom bindings, (update 24/08: after constantly forcing myself to look up ways to do things without just going jjj or kkkk or whatever repetitive motions you would normally do, I’m a much better vim user now) I assigned ; to : a while ago, but I moved to <space>. While it’s been hard to change my muscle memory, it means since my leader key is ,, I can have the sequence comma+semicolon executing <esc>.
